column4: Hi, I have a Asus P5E-V HDMI and a 3Com Gigabit-Switch. The LAN-Adapter is a onboard Atheros L1 PCIe Gb LAN controller. So Switch and LAN-Adapter are gigabit-capable, but I only get a 100MBb/s-connection. Is there anything I can do?
my cable is fine, works for my notebook, but let me test the cable actually connected to my notebook again
that's good so we can narrow down the cause to the nic
